item.title: Sorting 排序算法
item.description: Visualization of Sorting Algorithms https://www.cs.usfca.edu/~galles/visualization/ComparisonSort.html https://visualgo.net/bn/sorting https://www.toptal.com/developers/sorting-algorithms References MIT, 6.006, Introduction to Algorithms, LECTURE 3 CLRS , Chapter 2 Summary Best-Case $T(n)$ Worst-Case $T(n)$ Average-Case $T(n)$? Space Complexity Bubble Sort $O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ Selection Sort $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ Insertion Sort $O(n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(1)$ Merge Sort $O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(n)$ Quick Sort $O(n\log n)$ $O(n^2)$ $O(n\log n)$ $O(1)$ Can We Sort Faster?
